data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module uses Authen::Pam to authenticate and change password of
    a user with PAM.

    Authen::Pam is the perl bindings to libpam.

    Authem::SimplePam on the other hand does not requires any knowledge
    on how to use libpam from the module user.

    This facilitates its use by scripts and system administrators that
    does not have the time to learn libpam.
